title: am i the only one?
body: recently, league has been running very very very slowly. never had this problem, it usually runs at a solid 80fps on high setting but now i can't even look for a match. when i do it runs at 12 fps. ive lowered the setting but it doesnt seem to help. everything else on my computer seems fine and my internet isnt that bad either. i heard that there was an update where a stronger graphics card is needed :/ all suggestions to help fix this would be much appreciated. (i have a core i5 processor, windows 10)

replies.body: I faced something similar last week, it was because my computer graphics card wasn't up to date(Using NVIDIA) also because my computer was auto-selecting my intel graphics card instead of NVIDIA. Find out what graphics card you're using and see if it has updates and is set to be your primary graphics card
my graphics card is actually quite good, but i figured out how to fix it. Thanks for the help though c:

FPS issues are most often caused by driver or hardware issues. We've consolidated the most common solutions inside of our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), so I recommend working through those steps.

Let me know if that guide helped resolve this.
I havent read the guide yet, but I was able to fix it with some messing around. Thank you for the help though!
